description: Triangle of partial row sums (prs) of triangle A055252.
comments: In the language of the Shapiro et al. reference (given in A053121) such a lower triangular (ordinary) convolution array, considered as matrix, belongs to the Riordan-group. The G.f. for the row polynomials p(n,x) (increasing powers of x) is (((1-z)^3)/(1-2*z)^4)/(1-x*z/(1-z)).This is the fourth member of the family of Riordan-type matrices obtained from A007318(n,m) (Pascal's triangle read as lower triangular matrix) by repeated application of the prs-procedure.The column sequences appear as A049612(n+1), A055585, A001794, A001789(n+3), A027608, A055586 for m=0..5.
formula: a(n, m)=sum(A055252(n, k), k=m..n), n >= m >= 0, a(n, m) := 0 if n<m, (sequence of partial row sums in column m).Column m recursion: a(n, m)= sum(a(j, m), j=m..n-1)+ A055252(n, m), n >= m >= 0, a(n, m) := 0 if n<m.G.f. for column m: (((1-x)^3)/(1-2*x)^4)*(x/(1-x))^m, m >= 0.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, May 26 2000
